author: eptwts
text:
you won't make money by "learning AI"...

you make money by learning how to make money

and you use AI as a tool to help you perform these money-making actions faster, and/or at scale

there's a reason there's a thousand cracked technical nerds on this app who are documenting their $3k MRR SaaS

& then there's an anon 90iq chadrammer who just done a $100k day by ripping AI creatives for some random aff offers

focus less on the technical aspects & more on the desired outcomes

AI is just a tool to execute your ideas, applying the 80/20 principle is key
